description: Scala.js source code for a TodoMVC application using binding and DOM manipulation, defining classes, models, and UI components.

classes.name: Todo
classes.description: Class representing a Todo item with title and completion status.

classes.name: TodoList
classes.description: Class representing a list of Todos with display text and URL hash.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads Todo items from local storage.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves Todo items to local storage.

methods.name: header
methods.description: Creates the header UI component with input for new todos.

methods.name: todoListItem
methods.description: Creates a UI list item for a Todo, with editing and toggle functionality.

methods.name: mainSection
methods.description: Creates the main section with toggle all and list of todos.

methods.name: footer
methods.description: Creates the footer with filters and clear completed button.

methods.name: todoapp
methods.description: Assembles the main TodoMVC application UI.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point to render the TodoMVC app into the DOM container.
